course_title: Special Topics in PE: Intro. to Intramural Sports
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 24 / Seats Avail: 24Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: We are welcoming gender non-conforming individuals and their allies to participate in this multi-sport course as a safe introductory space to intramural sports.  For permission to take this class please contact juliana.alexandra.frigerio@emory.edu.
course_description: Course based on selected topics of interest in fitness and exercise. Activity focus will vary. May be repeated (up to 2 credit hours) for credit when topic varies.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in Woodruff PE Cntr Auxillary Cou
